Key Match Events: West Indies won by 2 wickets (with 7 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell stated that batting spin well in the middle overs could be key to West Indies' success
Arshdeep Singh praised Tilak Varma's debut performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain is expected, and two of the last five T20Is at Providence Stadium in Guyana have been washed out
West Indies and India had played a T20I at Providence in 2019, but no member from the visitors' playing XI from that game is part of the squad for the ongoing T20I series
Others: Kuldeep Yadav is one of the four bowlers to have an average less than 15 and an economy rate under seven in T20Is
Kyle Mayers averages only 20.81 as an opener in T20Is, the second-lowest for any West Indies batter to have opened at least 20 times in the format
